title: Low-income neighborhoods more vulnerable to flooding, extreme heat

title_detail.value: Low-income neighborhoods more vulnerable to flooding, extreme heat

summary: The methods can be replicated by cities to help them identify which neighborhoods are most at risk and what demographic factors characterize the most vulnerable citizens.
